------=_NextPart_001_2DAD_01C2F982.17228C40
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Gordon,

Attached are 
-    A proposal for the JAnt based nightly builds an=
d JUnit based unit tests. Please review it.
-    Schedule for the work item=
s with their estimates as per the discussion we had with Raymie when he was=
 here. The same schedule is available in two formats, excel and microsoft p=
roject.

DNS Implementation checkins made :
-     DNSJava library class is =
modified to disable caching since it was unbounded. So, the class org.xbill=
.DNS.Cache should prepend itself in the classpath before the DNSJava librar=
y classes. I will take care of this in the ant built scripts. Until then, i=
t has to be done manually.
-     Error propogation to the next stage. I hav=
e modified CrawlHost to support error states.
-     Documented the class.
-=
     Some more cleanup and configurability added.

After discussion with Ra=
ymie, we stopped converting the DNSJava library to non-blocking mode for tw=
o reasons..
-     Its author was not keen enough in doing it. He is yet to =
comment on my design proposal.
-     The proposal which I made would be ove=
r SEDA only. So, to make it usable by others, we may have to spend much mor=
e effort on it.

I am not sure why I get the following errors while checkin=
g out the files (README, anecdote.cfg, etc). I doubt it could be a permissi=
on problem. I will look into it and then update the README and the anecdote=
.cfg files.

cvs checkout: cannot open CVS/Entries.Log: No such file or dir=
ectory
U Anecdote/README
cvs checkout: cannot open CVS/Entries.Log: No such=
 file or directory
U Anecdote/anecdote-plus.cfg
 
Thanks,
Reddy


------=_NextPart_001_2DAD_01C2F982.17228C40
